ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:40:37 [Issue ID 4000-28818] urn:comicvine:4000-28818 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:58:40. [Issue ID 43619]
ComicInfo.Summary: *Contents* Jack explores the dystopian MTV world. He discovers his dog Kojak transformed into a round, puffball type animal with human intelligence and the ability to speak. His mother, Mrs. Swift transformed into a militant mother, sporting a shaved scalp and bright green lipstick. On the order of His Awesomeness, Jack is ordered under arrest for book possession. He escapes with the help of his high school crush,Doreen, now transformed into a leather clad motorcyclist. Damon is revealed to be, His Awesomeness, the ruler of the dystopian world.
ComicInfo.Tags: Doreen Taggert,Archie Goodwin,Uncle Zach,Damon Xarnett,Mrs. Swift,Kojak,Video Jack
ComicInfo.Title: The Grateful Live
